OOC: Hmm several grenades...i only fired one haha...can't fire more
than three in either of my modes...

The vulture slowed and transformed into his bot mode turning to look
at the retreating bot...
"Look me in the eyes bot...look into the eyes of HALUCIGEN"
Halucigen was hoping the bot would and then he could have some real fun...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl::
>
> Prowl watches Najah attacking Fireblade, seeing the short struggle end
> with Najah running off to fire at HotRod, and Fireblade fire several
> more EMP grenades at him. He slows the EMP grenades with his mind,
> making them fall down toward the ground before they exploded, Prowl
> out of their range. His mind gives him the warning of an approaching
> bot seconds before he hears the scream, Prowl twisting in the air and
> barely avoiding the vulture. He powers his boosters, trying to get
> away.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > The new bot that had been flyng at top speed for a while since his
> > crash in the Sahera came close to the battle at the CF. He used his
> > keen sence to find bots that were weak or dead. The easiet fights he
> > figured. Qucikly scanning the area and calculating chances against
> > everybot as with a single glance he spotted the bot Prowl distracted
> > in the air.
> > "Scrraaaawww...." the vulture screamed as he flew at Prowls back his
> > large claws ready to rip threw him and his mouth open to pry him
> > apart. He also liked the pretty globes that Prowl had thinking to
> take
> > them for himself.
